scripts.all: npm install && npm run install-appbackend && npm run all-apponly
scripts.all-apponly: npm install && npm prune && npm prune && npm run prepare && npm run build-all && npm run defaultdata-dev-import && npm run defaultdata-prod-import
scripts.build-all: npm run build-electron-package && npm run build-after-copy-contrib && npm run build-after-copy-appbackend-solr && npm run build-after-copy-sbin && npm run build-after-copy-overrides && npm run del-packageddist-solr
scripts.build-electron-package: cd app-backend && npm install && npm run electron-rebuild && npm prune && cd .. && electron-packager src/app --overwrite --extra-resource app-backend --out dist
scripts.install-appbackend: npm run install-appbackend-prepare && npm run install-appbackend-solr && npm run install-appbackend-package
scripts.install-appbackend-prepare: npm run install-appbackend-src && npm run install-appbackend-checkout && npm run install-appbackend-copy-overrides && cd app-backend-src && npm install && npm prune
scripts.install-appbackend-package: npm run install-appbackend-build && npm run install-appbackend-cleanout && npm run install-appbackend-package-dist && npm run install-appbackend-package-sbin && npm run install-appbackend-package-installer && npm run install-appbackend-package-migrations
scripts.install-appbackend-package-dist: cpx --include-empty-dirs --verbose "app-backend-src/dist/**/*" app-backend/dist/ && cpx --include-empty-dirs --verbose "app-backend-src/package-dist.json" app-backend/ && mv app-backend/package-dist.json app-backend/package.json
scripts.install-appbackend-build: cd app-backend-src && npm run backend-test && npm run testCoverage && npm run backend-build && npm run build-viewer-de && npm run build-dev && npm run frontendserver-build-dev-de && npm run frontendserver-build-server-dev-de && npm run frontendserver-build-angularserver-dev-de && npm run frontendserver-build-admin-dev-de && npm run build-prod && npm run frontendserver-build-prod-de && npm run frontendserver-build-server-prod-de && npm run frontendserver-build-angularserver-prod-de && npm run frontendserver-build-admin-prod-de

install-appbackend-src-os.darwin: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf app-backend-src && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend-src && ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf app-backend && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend/dist && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend/sbin
install-appbackend-src-os.linux: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf app-backend-src && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend-src && ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf app-backend && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend/dist && ./node_modules/.bin/mkdirp app-backend/sbin
install-appbackend-src-os.win32: node_modules\.bin\rimraf app-backend-src && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp app-backend-src && node_modules\.bin\rimraf app-backend && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp app-backend && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp app-backend/dist && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp app-backend/sbin

prepare-build-os.win32: node_modules\.bin\rimraf dist && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp dist && node_modules\.bin\mkdirp dist\contrib
